title: Idea for Mordekaiser
body: So if they ever decide to touch Morde, how about this: Either for all his skins, or to make it less work, for his new skin(if he'll ever have one) make it that ulted enemies will wear a cursed Mordekaiser helmet for the duration. Imo it would look funny if a low hp adc is running around in panic having a cursed helmet of our Revenant planted onto him(especially if it wouldn't match the looks of a said champion).
